sect2.title: Contents of Gzip
sect2.para: The gzip package contains programs to compress and decompress files using the Lempel-Ziv coding (LZ77).

sect3.title: Program Files
sect3.para: gunzip (link to gzip), gzexe, gzip, uncompress (link to gunzip), zcat (link to gzip), zcmp, zdiff, zforce, zgrep, zmore and znew
